short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Re:place all instances of re with re:

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: So many words start with 're'. Wouldn't it be interesting to be re:minded of this fact by seeing 're:' every single time you see 're'? Also has the gre:at side effect of showing up in the middle of words.
